metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6599 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible
metadata.Description: libstagefright in Android before 5.1.1 LMY48T allows remote attackers toexecute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) viaa crafted media file, aka internal bug 23416608.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
